documentation.content: Alerts when usage reaches 80%. [View and edit quotas](https://console.cloud.google.com/iam-admin/quotas?${URL_PARAMS})

conditions.displayName: Usage nearing daily rate quota limit

conditionMonitoringQueryLanguage.query: fetch ${MONITORED_RESOURCE}| filter ${OUTER_FILTER}| {metric ${METRIC_USAGE_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_USAGE_FILTER}${OPTIONAL_USAGE_QUERY}|map add [day: end().timestamp_to_string('%Y%m%d', 'America/Los_Angeles').string_to_int64]| group_by 1d, .sum| map add [current_day: end().timestamp_to_string('%Y%m%d', 'America/Los_Angeles').string_to_int64]| (current_day == day)| group_by [${GROUPING}]; metric ${METRIC_LIMIT_TYPE}| filter ${QUOTA_LIMIT_FILTER}| group_by [${GROUPING}], .min}| ratio| window 1d| every 1m| condition gt(val(), 0.8 '1')
